Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;tritium^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Tritium is actually quite useful, you can throw it in a centrifuge or use it for fuel.
You can generate a lot of power with a ^orange;Fission Reactor^reset; in your lab. Show you can make one using your ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring me some ^green;tritium^reset;.
